title: HM Queen Elizabeth II – 2022 Statement on Prince Andrew
author: admin
summary: The statement made by HM Queen Elizabeth II on 13 January 2022.
content:
With The Queen’s approval and agreement, The Duke of York’s military affiliations and Royal patronages have been returned to The Queen.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

The Duke of York will continue not to undertake any public duties and is defending this case as a private citizen.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
